headline: Pennsylvania GOP Will Nominate a Crackpot for Governor
author: Taegan Goddard
sentences:
Amanda Carpenter: “LOL, if you thought Donald Trump’s endorsement of Dr. Mehmet Oz for Senate was the worst development in Pennsylvania’s 2022 GOP primaries, wait until you hear about the Republicans running for governor.”
“Pennsylvania Republicans will nominate a 2020 election conspiracist for governor in the May 17 primary.

And, there’s an excellent chance the nuttiest bunny of them all, Doug Mastriano, is going to win the primary.”
“Which means that Republicans might get a crackpot governing this swing state in 2024.
The only thing differentiating them is how far down the rabbit hole they go.

What could possibly go wrong?”
Save to Favorites
How can I be sure of that?
